      • getMap

        public AbstractMap getMap()

      • getViewSpcX

        public abstract int getViewSpcX(GameView View)
        Calculate position in view space.
        Parameters:
        View -
        Returns:
        Returns the center of the projected (screen) x-position where the object is rendered without regarding the camera. It also adds the cell offset.

      • getViewSpcY

        public abstract int getViewSpcY(GameView View)
        Calculate position in view space.
        Parameters:
        View -
        Returns:
        Returns the center of the projected (view space) y-position where the object is rendered without regarding the camera.

      • getBlock

        public abstract CoreData getBlock()
        Clamps positions over the map at topmost layer.
        Returns:
        Get the block at the position. If the coordiante is not in memory crash. Faster than "getBlockSafe()"
        See Also:
        #getBlockSafe()

      • cpy

        public abstract AbstractPosition cpy()
        Returns:
        a copy of the object.

      • isInMemoryAreaHorizontal

        public abstract boolean isInMemoryAreaHorizontal()
        Checks if the position is on the chunks currently in memory. Horizontal checks only. So the position can be udner or over the map.
        Returns:

      • isInMemoryArea

        public abstract boolean isInMemoryArea()
        Checks if the position is on the chunks currently in memory. Checks all axis'.
        Returns:
        true if inside a chunk. false if currently not loaded.

        public abstract AbstractPosition addVector(float x,
                                           float y,
                                           float z)
        Add a vector to the position. Implementation may differ.
        Parameters:
        x - Dependent on implementation.
        y - Dependent on implementation.

        Returns:

      • getDepth

        public int getDepth(GameView view)
        Returns the depth of the object. The depth is an int value wich is needed for producing the list of the renderorder. The higher the value the later it will be drawn.
        Parameters:
        view -
        Returns:
        the depth in game size
